Flappy Mario (iOS Game)

Languages: Objective-C
Summary: to learn Objective-C, and various iOS frameworks
4 Screenshots

Details

This is the very first mobile game I've made. You can view the source code here.
I did not use the best method to detect collisions in this project, how I wish I was exposed to SpriteKit earlier.

Tools/Framworks Used:

Language:

  • Objective-C

    • Frameworks:

  • UIKit
  • Foundation
  • CoreGraphics

    • General Rules:

    A mock version of the original flappy bird, with different rules:

  • Eating an apple gains you one point
  • Eating a strawberry gains you two points
  • Touching pipes leads you to game over
